body_html:
You should have cuda installations at /usr/local/cuda-9.0 for CUDA 9 and ad /usr/local/cuda-8.0 for CUDA 8. There should be a symlink from /usr/local/cuda to the CUDA version that you want to use. You might need to add /usr/local/cuda/lib64 to your LD_LIBRARY_PATH (but follow the CUDA installation instructions). You should not have CUDA installations anywhere else.

This is the CUDA setup that you need no matter how you install Caffe2.
